Mpekere 67 maka ụbọchị Nelson Mandela bụ òtù mba ụwa na-enweghị uru nke e guzobere na South Africa iji chetara onye isi ala mbụ a họpụtara site na ọchịchị onye kwuo na ndị ọzọ na ímé ihe uche ya nke South Africa, Nelson Mandela.

A malitere ọrụ ebere ahụ na Disemba 2013 mgbe onye na-enyere Nelson Mandela aka, Zelda la Grange, mara Carolyn Steyn aka ịkpa blanket 67 iji kwado ụbọchị Mandela kwa afọ iji nye ndị nọ na mkpa. Òtù Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu kwupụtara na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'aka ụmụaka hụrụ n'anya nwụrụ anwụ na ụdị Ụbọchị Mandela bụ ụbọchị mbà n'ime anyị ụwa kwa afọ na 2009, iji sọpụrụ Nelson Mandela, nke a na-eme kwa afọ na 18th July, bụ ụbọchị ọmụmụ Nelson Mandela.
N'afọ 2015, Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ Mgbazi nke South Africa wepụtara 67 Blankets maka Ụbọchị Nelson Mandela dị ka akụkụ nke mmemme mmezigharị ndị omempụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ South Africa.
Kemgbe e guzobere ya, 67 Blankets for Nelson Mandela Day etinyela Guinness World Records atọ, ya bụ:

Iji cheta 100 afọ kemgbe a mụrụ Nelson Mandela, 67 Blankets maka Nelson Mandela Day jikọtara aka na Zonderwater Maximum Correctional Centre na Cullinan, South Africa na South African Department of Correctional Services iji mepụta ma gosipụta onyinyo nke Nelson Mandela nke nwere ihe dị ka 4,000 blanket.

Na mmekorita ya na Johannesburg International Mozart Festival, 67 Blankets maka Nelson Mandela Day gbalịrị imebi Guinness World Record maka ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'otu ebe n'otu oge, na Linder Auditorium na Johannesburg.
Na 9 June 2021, 67 Blankets for Nelson Mandela Day kpughere Bokke Blanket ya e ji aka ya kụzie ma kụzie ya iji sọpụrụ ndị otu rugby mba, Springboks, bụ ndị meriri 2019 Rugby World Cup na Japan.
